description:
~30 days Money Back Guarantee~

You know that feeling when you feel like you are digging a never-ending hole with no end in sight and really struggling to quit your job and start your own business from home?

Opening a recruitment agency is one such business that doesn't require any technical knowledge. You can run your company sitting at home.

In this course, we (Jyotsna and Harsh) give out the exact blueprint to start and run a recruitment agency. I interviewed Jyotsna and asked her some of the toughest questions and she revealed everything about her business.

This course is an actionable approach to start and run your own job recruitment agency:

✔ Create a blueprint to start your business

✔ Understand, how to start the business

✔ Get the exact script Jyotsna used to pitch her clients

✔ Learn how to get clients for your recruitment agency

✔ Clarify all the doubts about starting an agency

✔ Learn the craziest mistakes Jyotsna made

✔ Even better than a thousand dollar course

✔ Avoid the mistakes and hack your way to success

✔ Proven techniques and results

✔ Actionable tips that you can implement today

✔ Very easy to understand and implement

✔ Get 1-on-1 help from instructors

How is this course structured?

I have taken a whole new approach to making this course more interactive. You will find Video Lectures, Audio Lectures, Visual Workbooks, Quizzes to Weekly Q&A sessions.

It's really exciting once you get started with this course. I am waiting to see you on the inside....
title: Start a Recruitment Agency from Home
